channel.title: Is it legal to use BMS textures?
channel.description: I'm making a map for CSGO, which is Half life themed, and i need textures. I saw a guy using BMS textures, so the question is that is it legal to use BMS textures in another game?

item.title: Is it legal to use BMS textures?
item.dc:creator: Cryoshell
item.description:
You can use them, but only for non-commercial purposes.

Read full topic
item.source: Is it legal to use BMS textures?
